application

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • application.Main

  • public class Main
extends javafx.application.Application

    Schedulr Client

    This is the client code for running up the GUI system. This class is the main Component servicing the Client Side. This class will be responsible for rendering and handling events on the client side.
    Author:
    Baani Leen and Viresh Gupta

      • requestRoomBooking

        public static boolean requestRoomBooking(ExtraSlot s)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Request the server to book a particular room. Returns True/False depending on Accept/Rejection of Request.
        Parameters:
        s - This is the slot that needs to be booked
        Returns:
        True/False Based on whether the room request was taken into waiting queue / booked or not.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When Socket is closed or Object cannot be serialized
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - When object could not be read properly

      • auditRoomBooking

        public static boolean auditRoomBooking(ExtraSlot s)
                                throws java.io.IOException,
                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        The replacement booking for an already existing slot. Can only be invoked by admin. NOTE: Use carefully. The slot to be replaced must have already been deleted by removeBooking.()
        Parameters:
        s - New slot, that will be replaced.
        Returns:
        True/False depending on if this new slot is in clash with existing ones.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When Socket is closed or Object cannot be serialized
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - When object could not be read properly.

        public static java.lang.String acceptBookings(Slot k)
                                       throws java.io.IOException,
                                              java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        Parameters:
        k - The slot for which to accept.
        Returns:
        Returns a string indication whether clashes or succesful acceptance.

      • authenticate

        public static boolean authenticate(java.lang.String email,
                                   java.lang.String pass)
                            throws java.io.IOException,
                                   java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        This method will authenticate whether the user is the required person or not In case user is the person, place the user in the static user object for further use
        Parameters:
        email - The Email Id of person to authenticate
        pass - The password of person to authenticate
        Returns:
        True/False depending if the email and password are both valid or not.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - When Socket is closed or Object cannot be serialized
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - When object could not be read properly
